header: Do you have your invitation code?

hasInvitationCode.legend: Do you have your invitation code?

yes.label: Yes, I have my invitation code
yes.hint: You can find this on your Get your State Pension letter

no.label: No, I do not have my invitation code
no.hint: You can ask us to send an invitation code to your home address

errors.required: Select yes if you have your invitation code
